data.comment: The match is underway in Harrison.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 2, Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nashville's Daniel Rios breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 5, Ismail Elfath signals a Montreal throw-in in Nashville's half.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Derrick Jones for Nashville drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Montreal's Samuel Piette misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Throw-in for Nashville at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 21, Alex Muyl (Nashville) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Nashville, close to Montreal's area.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 26, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Montreal.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Harrison.
In the minute 28, Walker Zimmerman gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nashville.
Montreal are pushing forward but Romell Quioto's finish is wide of the goal.
Ismail Elfath awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Nashville are coming forward and Daniel Lovitz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, Goal! Nashville have got their heads in front thanks to a Randall Leal strike.
Great play from Alex Muyl to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 35, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville.
Montreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Nashville at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 40, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jorge Luis Corrales for Montreal who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 43, Montrealâ€™s Jorge Luis Corrales is on his feet again at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in Nashville.
In the minute 45, Nashville needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
Bojan Krkic of Montreal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
At Red Bull Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Red Bull Arena.
Walker Zimmerman (Nashville) has been booked during the half time break!
Ismail Elfath has blown to start the second-half.
Orji Okwonkwo is on a sub for Maximiliano Urruti for Montreal.
In the minute 48, Free kick Nashville.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Montreal drives forward and Samuel Piette gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Montreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 53, Montreal's Jorge Luis Corrales has been booked in Harrison.
In the minute 54, Nashville's Alex Muyl is on target but unsuccessful.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
In the minute 56, Montreal needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Harrison.
In the minute 58, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Nashville are whistled for offside.
In the minute 59, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Jhonder Cadiz is replacing Daniel Rios for Nashville at Red Bull Arena.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 63, Jhonder Cadiz for Nashville is whistled offside.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Montreal.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 64, Nashville pushes forward through Alex Muyl, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 66, Can Montreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Randall Leal for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
In the minute 69, Ismail Elfath signals a Montreal throw-in in Nashville's half.
Free kick Montreal.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In Harrison Nashville drive forward through Randall Leal. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 72, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Montreal to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Thierry Henry (Montreal) is making a second substitution, with Amar Sejdic replacing Maciel.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Nashville.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montreal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 75, Nashville pushes forward through Jhonder Cadiz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gary Smith is making the team's second substitution at Red Bull Arena with Brian Anunga replacing Anibal Godoy.
The away team replace Derrick Jones with Abu Danladi.
In the minute 78, Jhonder Cadiz of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ismail Elfath awards Montreal a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 79, Free kick Nashville.
Jukka Raitala is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 81, Ismail Elfath signals a Montreal throw-in in Nashville's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Montreal are pushing forward but Bojan Krkic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, Nashville have a goal kick.
Ismail Elfath blows against Montreal's Romell Quioto for offside.
Nashville make their fourth substitution with Taylor Washington replacing Randall Leal.
In the minute 87, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Montreal.
In Harrison Nashville attack through Walker Zimmerman. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
Goal kick for Nashville at Red Bull Arena.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Samuel Piette with Mason Toye. This is the third substitution made today by Thierry Henry.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ismail Elfath awards Nashville a goal kick.
Ismail Elfath signals a Montreal throw-in in Nashville's half.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
The match has come to a close in Harrison. The final score is 0-1.
At Red Bull Arena, Luis Binks has been yellow-carded for the home team.
